xplane_config.py

Holds config variables that are used throughout the addon.

Summary
xplane_config.pyHolds config variables that are used throughout the addon.
Variables
debugSet to True for debugging output using debugger.
logSet to True, to log debug output in a file.
profileSet to True to use profiling processes using the profiler.
versionInteger containing the version number of the addon.
debuggerAn instance of XPlaneDebugger which is used to output debug information.
profilerInstance of XPlaneProfiler which is used to profile processes.

Variables

debug

debug

Set to True for debugging output using debugger.  Default is True, as we are still dealing with a development release.

log

log

Set to True, to log debug output in a file.  This is still experimental.

profile

profile

Set to True to use profiling processes using the profiler.  Profiling results will be printed to the console.

version

version

Integer containing the version number of the addon.  Until we reach a release candidate it will stay 3200 (3.20).

debugger

debugger

An instance of XPlaneDebugger which is used to output debug information.

profiler

profiler

Instance of XPlaneProfiler which is used to profile processes.

debug
Set to True for debugging output using debugger.
debugger
An instance of XPlaneDebugger which is used to output debug information.
log
Set to True, to log debug output in a file.
profile
Set to True to use profiling processes using the profiler.
profiler
Instance of XPlaneProfiler which is used to profile processes.
version
Integer containing the version number of the addon.
Prints debugging information and optionally logs them to a file.
Stores profiling information of processes.
